enhanced_description: BI WORLDWIDE is a global engagement agency leveraging behavioral economics principles to drive measurable business results across employees, channel partners, and customers. They design and deliver comprehensive solutions including employee recognition, rewards, eLearning, and employee engagement programs. Additionally, they offer travel & sales incentives and coalition marketing, aiming to attract, engage, and retain employees, facilitate effective sales contests, and build dynamic customer loyalty programs. Their services focus on inspiring employee engagement, strengthening channel partner relationships to support incremental sales, and cultivating deep customer loyalty.
